Johnson, James Warner Bellah, Willis Goldbeck', 'Number of discs': '1'} Great movie, fun characters, great message (Right wins out with courage).

Lee Marvin almost stole the movie!

If you love the Duke - add it to your collection.

(Personally, I don't care if the Duke read the Hollywood phone book out loud - it would still be a GREAT movie.) Don't over-think it {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Todd Graff'], 'Producers': ['Michael Nathanson', 'Joseph Farrell', 'Catherine Paura', 'Broderick Johnson', 'Andrew A. Kosove', 'Timothy M. Bourne', 'Queen Latifah', 'Shakim Compere'], 'Starring': ['Queen Latifah', 'Dolly Parton', 'Keke Palmer'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} The movie had a great premise. I thought it would be on the lines of "Sister Act". A clean comedy with joyful music. It was until someone had to interject profanity into the movie for some strange reason. THEN we had choir members sleeping with each other - yeah - that was funny and so very Christian like. It was so sad to see beautiful voices wasted. And Dolly - what were you thinking??

So - turned it off (after we paid to rent it) and read a book..... Could have been great = Slams Christian values Seven Days in Utopia Robert Duvall (Actor), Lucas Black (Actor), Matt Russell (Director) & 0 more Rated: G Format: DVD Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Drama ["SEVEN DAYS IN UTOPIA follows the story of Luke Chisolm (Lucas Black), a talented young golfer set on making the pro tour. When his first big shot turns out to be a very public disaster, Luke escapes the pressures of the game and finds himself unexpectedly stranded in Utopia, Texas, home to eccentric rancher Johnny Crawford (Robert Duvall). But Johnny's more than meets the eye, and his profound ways of looking at life force Luke to question not only his past choices, but his direction for the future."] {'Genre': 'Drama, Sports', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Lucas Black, Matt Russell, Robert Duvall, Deborah Ann Woll, Jerry Ferrara, Madison Burge, Melissa Leo, KJ ChoiLucas Black, Matt Russell, Robert Duvall, Deborah Ann Woll, Jerry Ferrara, Madison Burge, Melissa Leo, KJ Choi See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 40 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.5 x 5.5 x 7.7 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ARCE82451DVD', 'Director': 'Matt Russell', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 40 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 29, 2011', 'Actors': 'Robert Duvall, Lucas Black, Melissa Leo, Deborah Ann Woll, Madison Burge', 'Studio': 'Arc Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'} Absolutely stunning in its simplicity and truth. A MUST SEE for Fathers, coaches, professionals in all walks of life. Give this as a gift to someone you love! Awesome We're No Angels (1955) Comedy, Romance, Cheerful, Gentle ["In Christmas, three prisoners - Joseph, Albert and Jules - escape from the Devil's Island to a small coastal town in France. They decide to rob a store to get some money and clothes and travel by ship to another place"] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael Curtiz'], 'Producers': ['Pat Duggan'], 'Starring': ['Humphrey Bogart', 'Aldo Ray', 'Peter Ustinov']} One of the best Christmas movies to ever come out of Hollywood! The cast is superb, the humor and wit is intensely understated. This is a timeless movie! YAY! VeggieTales: The Wonderful Wizard of Ha's (DVD) Brian Roberts (Director), Mike Nawrocki (Actor), Phil Vischer (Actor, Writer) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family ["VeggieTales: The Wonderful Wizard of Ha's (DVD)", "Meet Darby [Junior Asparagus] who more than anything else in the world just wants to have fun. When he learns about the Wonderful Land of Ha's - an amusement park with all the fixins - and its mysterious wizard who promises to make his dreams come true, Darby is determined to go. Darby decides that nothing is going to stop him and he makes a choice that will change his life forever. Will it be worth everything Darby has given up? Find out in this story of the prodigal son - an over-the-rainbow adventure that reminds kids everywhere that there's no place like home.", ']]>'] {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Animation, Educational', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Phil Vischer, Brian Roberts, J. This is a good movie that can open the door to discussions in many families Another good movie with a message {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Cristobal Krusen'], 'Producers': ['Carol Appleby', 'John Hossler', 'Matthew Kinne', 'Douglas B. Maddox', 'Christopher Morrow'], 'Starring': ['Tom Emmott', 'Allen Williamson', 'George Seder'], 'Studio': ['Josh McDowell Ministry.']} Anger, Sorrow, Pain, Disappointment, Adversity, Sexual Abuse, Reconciliation, Victory! Undaunted: The Early Life of Josh McDowell contains all of these elements. Most of us have experienced one or more in our lives. The struggle of Josh McDowell to disprove the resurrection or Christ leads to a decision that will change his life, and the lives of countless others. A must see! God Bless the Broken Road {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English'], 'Directors': ['Farhad Mann', 'Shawn Alex Thompson', 'Don McBrearty', "John L'Ecuyer"], 'Producers': ['Cal Coons', 'Christina Jennings', 'Scott Garvie', 'Noel Hedges'], 'Starring': ['Yannick Bisson', 'Helene Joy', 'Thomas Craig']} My best half found this on Prime and we gave it a go. Hooked! Love the characters, the time setting, and the fledgling forensics that we take for granted today! Start with season 1 and work your way UP! Good clean entertainment! Another great reason to have PRIME! A totally expected treasure! {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Darren Aronofsky'], 'Producers': ['Scott Franklin', 'Darren Aronofsky', 'Mary Parent', 'Arnon Milchan', 'Ari Handel', 'Chris Brigham'], 'Starring': ['Russell Crowe', 'Jennifer Connelly', 'Ray Winstone'], 'Studio': ['Paramount']} Stupid movie One Star {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Neil Fearnley'], 'Producers': ['Michael Landon Jr', 'Brian Bird', 'Brad Krevoy', 'Michael Shepard', 'Vicki Sotheran', 'Greg Malcolm'], 'Studio': ['Hallmark Channel']} Awesome family entertainment! profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user maintains a strong passion for classic Western films and family-oriented content emphasizing traditional values and engaging characters, particularly those with historical settings that reflect real-life struggles and triumphs.

- **Viewing Preferences:** They continue to prefer narratives highlighting courage, justice, and moral integrity. While open to series tackling serious subjects, they favor those that ultimately convey hope and triumph, supporting their commitment to family unity.

- **Rating Behavior:** Recent feedback indicates a critical response towards violence, foul language, and sexual content, aligning with their established preference for strong character development and clean entertainment. However, they recently rated a family film very highly, reinforcing their appreciation for wholesome narratives.

- **Content Engagement:** The user values stories rooted in high moral standards, seeking family-friendly entertainment that encourages deep discussions and shared experiences.

- **Collection Mindset:** They aspire to curate a collection of meaningful films that emphasize human experiences and moral dilemmas, continuing to favor clean entertainment.

- **Open-mindedness:** Despite a recent low rating trend, the user remains receptive to humor and diverse storytelling methods, prioritizing integrity and positive values.

Overall, the user strives for films and series that enhance quality family time and thoughtful reflection while combining engaging storytelling with strong moral foundations. Their recent interactions further emphasize their commitment to seeking out uplifting family entertainment.
